body_html:
@junshi15 @shamoya Hi. You are right, the messages have been renamed in phase 2 of the implementation. d931cf3. They are now called RDMA_META_DATA_UPDATE and RDMA_TENSOR_RE_REQUEST. I should probably update the PR notes. The README is already up-to-date with the full implementation. Sorry for the confusion.

Also good note about the comments. I will update them.

@junshi15 @shamoya  Hi. You are right, the messages have been renamed in phase 2 of the implementation. d931cf3. They are now called RDMA_META_DATA_UPDATE and RDMA_TENSOR_RE_REQUEST. body:
@junshi15 @shamoya  Hi. You are right, the messages have been renamed in phase 2 of the implementation. https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/pull/16005/commits/d931cf3c66138c0f2af1a92a0baddbf55a155107. They are now called **RDMA_META_DATA_UPDATE** and **RDMA_TENSOR_RE_REQUEST**. I should probably update the PR notes. The README is already up-to-date with the full implementation. Sorry for the confusion.

Also good note about the comments. I will update them.
